replies.body:
{{champion:201}} Tell me the truth Doctor. Is my Mustache going to be alright? 

{{champion:85}} I'm afraid it worst than I thought. This disease is not only making your mustache disappear, but it also destroying the source of where your hair grows. 

{{champion:201}} What do you mean?

{{champion:85}} I mean that it going to be impossible to grow a new mustache. Willpower, surgery, even magic will do nothing.  I'm afraid that the only thing that you can grow is...a goatee. 

{{champion:201}} NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

*Braum Bedroom*

{{champion:201}} AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!! *Deep Breath*

{{summoner:31}} Poro?

{{champion:201}} I am fine my friend. Just a bad dream.

{{summoner:31}} Poro? Poro poro

{{champion:201}} Yeah. That is last time I mix Graggy Ice with Goat Milk. Oh no.

{{summoner:31}} Poro?

{{champion:201}} I wasn't the only one that had that drink. Remember? We had the drinks over at Ashe and Tryndamere place. 

{{summoner:31}} Oh that is not good. 

{{champion:201}} Yeah I know-!? Did you just speak?

{{summoner:31}} Ummm...Poro poro. 

{{champion:201}} ........

{{summoner:31}} .......

{{champion:201}} I must still be dreaming.

Hey LightDragoon I made up my own little story for Lunar Revel

{{champion:254}} Ugh I'm bored, why couldn't we go to the festival this year?

{{champion:51}} Because last time we went Jinx blew up half of the city

{{champion:254}} Come on Jinx hasn't done anything in a week I bet she went to celebrate

{{champion:51}} We're not going and that's that

*Knocking on door*

{{champion:254}} Akali? What are you doing here? and why are you all burnt up?

{{champion:84}} I think this belongs to you two... *pulls Jinx up to door by her hair*

{{champion:222}} Ow Ow Ow, knock it off! Oh Hey Fat Hands you sure did miss an awesome party

I couldn't think of anything past this point but I feel I did good for my first story :D

Just thought if this little part

{{champion:84}} Jinx, don't come back to Ionia, ever

{{champion:222}} Aww come on I didn't do anything, sides Kat killed like 50 people and you didn't go after her

{{champion:84}} Katarina didn't mount a rocket onto one of our ancient statues and try to launch it as a firework

{{champion:222}} Still was an awesome explosion
I know this is going to sound really stupid but what is the Lunar Revel?
So apparently poros are Pokemon?
No they are not Pokemon, they are Poromon.
{{summoner:31}}  pikachu
{{summoner:31}}  Porochu
LOL that is what I was gonna reply to him. ;p
{{summoner:31}} Poro!!!

1 cup of {{champion:12}} Goat milk
2 cans of {{champion:79}} Ice
Mix, mix, mix... {{champion:27}} 
Serve cold.
yes if u want premium milk squeeze {{champion:12}} udders, then u shake the milk, and boom u have a premium milkshake
I thought you couldn't milk those?.?
Singed, the greatest mixologist in Runeterra. Even can make a pretty mean beach cocktail.
Braum is powerless without his mustache >:O! Also, I didn't know poros could say "Poro" :P Good job as always lightdragoon!

Love your stories Lightdragoon.
what I also love Is how your stories are inspiring others to write to.
its really cool.
thank you

braum bedroom needs to be braum's bedroom but I LOVE THIS STORY THANK YOU LIGHTDRAGOON
{{champion:201}} {{summoner:31}} {{item:3151}}
XD this one is really funny. good work
Well done lightdragoon88 but I can't help but wonder what's ashe and tryn gonna dream about... haha ashe dreams that the freljord starts  melting.
I admit this is amusing, but the typing errors littered throughout are too annoying for me to ignore...
Yeah sorry about writing errors.
{{champion:24}} "this one's for you kid"
Why are Jax hands still purple in his Gladiator Skin, I feel like there is a texture error there.
he's wearing gloves.
Tomorrow's sale was six days ago. Wat
Ikr
they should put hydro thunder hurricane on sale
I honestly think the Draven jokes are getting old.......
Does Draven age? No.

draven is the best

i bought his ward
.....No comment -_-

{{champion:53}} LOG_57: BRAUM_LOG_1

{{champion:201}} *humming*

{{champion:69}} Hello, Braum. May I offer you a special ingredient?

{{champion:201}} Ah, hello, Cassie. (please note these two are close friends [or are they?]) Sure, I'll use anything for my mixture of Graggy Ice and my goat's milk.

{{champion:69}} Thank you, I needed that to get off my hands. Bye, Braum!

{{champion:201}} Goodbye! Ah, I'll visit Tryndamere and Ashe, then.

*at Tryndamere's house*

{{champion:201}} Hello, my friends.

{{champion:22}} Hi.

{{champion:23}} Hey. What's that you got in your hand, Braum?

{{champion:201}} 'Tis fine goat's milk with yordle hair mixed with something a friend gave me. And Graggy Ice too.

{{champion:22}} Ah, that Graggy Ice has been causing trouble for many. You might want to be careful.

{{champion:201}} Well, anyways, I got three-Hey, where'd the third one go?

{{champion:23}} It's probably Trundle, he's always stealing things these days.

{{champion:201}} Sorry, Ashe. It looks like you can't drink it.

{{champion:22}} It's okay, I didn't want to drink it, anyways.

{{champion:201}} Well, Tryndamere, cheers!

{{champion:23}} Cheers, Braum! *drinks*

{{champion:201}} *drinks*

Good job, Rito. Apparently this sale came out 2 days before the previous one.

I own all these skins.

J4's just got a visual upgrade and looks really good.

The Ashe skin is a classic, if just a simple recolor.

The Jax artwork is better than the actual skin.  It suffers from the size shrinkage (like a lot of Riot skins), though the bit of unique VO is kinda cool.
